name: click5 CRM add-on to WPForms
author: click5 Interactive

sections.description:
Seemingly integrate your WPForms forms with click5 CRM.

Simple and easy to use plugin allowing you to post new inquiries from your WordPress website directly into click5 CRM without a need to manually enter new contacts.

RATE OUR WPFORMS ADD-ON

sections.installation:
AUTOMATIC INSTALLATION

Automatic installation method is the easiest and most recommended option.

  1. Log in to your WordPress Dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu, and click on ‚ÄúAdd New‚Äù.
  2. Enter ‚Äòclick5‚Äô (without quotes) in the search field and click the ‚ÄòSearch Plugins‚Äô button.
  3. On the list of search results, click the ‘Install Now’ button for the ‘WPForms add-on by click5’ plugin.
  4. Then click the red ‘Active’ button to finalize the installation.

MANUAL INSTALLATION

  1. Download the plugin and unzip the contents. You should see a single folder named ‘wpf-add-on-by-click5’.
  2. Connect to the FTP server with your WordPress installation.
  3. Upload the ‘wpf-add-on-by-click5’ plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ folder on your FTP server.
  4. Continue to step 3 of Automatic Installation instructions above.
sections.faq:
Is this plugin free?

Yes, our plugin is completely free. There‚Äôs no premium version and no need to pay to get access to ‘extra’ features. We just love helping others!
